data.enText: a statement, fact, or situation that tells you why sth happened; a reason given for sth
The most likely explanation is that his plane was delayed.
data.chText: 最可能的解释是他的飞机晚点了。

data.enText: I can't think of any possible explanation for his absence.
data.chText: 我想不出他缺席的任何理由。

data.enText: She left the room abruptly without explanation .
data.chText: 她未作解释就突然离开了房间。

data.enText: ‘I had to see you,’ he said, by way of explanation.
data.chText: “我当时必须来找你。”他解释道。

data.enText: She didn't give an adequate explanation for being late.
data.chText: 她没有给出充分的理由说明迟到的原因。

data.enText: The book opens with an explanation of why some drugs are banned.
data.chText: 本书在开篇阐述了禁用某些药物的原因。

data.enText: an explanation as to why he had left early
data.chText: 关于他提早离开的原因说明

data.enText: a statement or piece of writing that tells you how sth works or makes sth easier to understand
data.chText: 解释性说法；说明性文字

data.enText: For a full explanation of how the machine works, turn to page 5.
data.chText: 关于机器工作原理的详细说明，请翻阅第5页。

simple_means.memory_skill: explain v.解释 + -ation 名词后缀

ex.zh: 合乎逻辑的解释（或阐述）

tr: a statement that makes something comprehensible by describing the relevant structure or operation or circumstances etc.

example: I heard his explanation of the accident

example.ex: She told the court she would give a full explanation of the prosecution's decision on Monday...
example.tran: 她告诉法庭她会在星期一对原告方的决定作出全面解释。

example.ex: There was a hint of schoolboy shyness in his explanation...
example.tran: 他的解释中带有一丝学生的羞涩。

example.ex: 'It's my ulcer,' he added by way of explanation.
example.tran: “那是因为我得了溃疡，”他补充解释说。

value.def: If you give an explanation of something that has happened, you give people reasons for it, especially in an attempt to justify it.

example.ex: The deputy airport manager said there was no apparent explanation for the crash...
example.tran: 机场副经理说那次飞机失事没有明显的原因。

example.ex: Digging further into the medical literature, I found out there was a scientific explanation for all this...
example.tran: 进一步翻阅医学文献后我发现，这些都是有科学解释的。

example.ex: It's the only explanation I can think of.
example.tran: 这是我能够想到的唯一理由。

value.def: If you say there is an explanation for something, you mean that there is a reason for it.

example.ex: Haig was immediately impressed by Charteris's expertise and by his lucid explanation of the work.
example.tran: 查特里斯的专业知识和他对作品浅显易懂的阐释立即给黑格留下了深刻印象。

value.def: If you give an explanation of something, you give details about it or describe it so that it can be understood.

trans: 合乎逻辑的解释（或阐述）
